font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 n. 动力： impetus of a physical object in motion
【例】 Their luck began to pick up momentum. 他们的运气开始转旺
【近】 boost, encouragement, goad刺激；激励, impetus, incentive, incitation, instigation, motivation, spur, stimulus
【反】 deterrent 阻碍物；obstruction, resistance 阻力
【记】 每一moment都是有力量的，动力，重力.
